text: Let's talk about common mistakes beginners make.
The biggest one is not committing to the rotation.
If you hesitate mid-air, you'll land off-balance.
Another mistake is looking down at your board.
Always look where you want to go, not at your feet.
Also, don't forget to pop! Many people just ride off the jump.
You need that upward momentum to complete rotations.
And finally, practice on smaller features first.
